suggest.pimcore/data-hub: Universal data interface for GraphQL, CSV and other formats

scripts.docker-composer:composer-install: docker compose exec php composer install
scripts.docker-composer:pimcore-classes-rebuild: docker compose exec php bin/console pimcore:deployment:classes-rebuild
scripts.docker-composer:presta-sitemaps-dump: docker compose exec php bin/console presta:sitemaps:dump
scripts.phpstan:run: bin/header/phpstan 'vendor/bin/phpstan analyse -c phpstan.neon --level max --memory-limit 512M src tests' 'run'
scripts.phpcs:check:all: bin/header/phpcs 'PHP_CS_FIXER_IGNORE_ENV=1 vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer --dry-run --using-cache=no --rules=@PSR12 --rules=no_unused_imports --verbose fix src 2>/dev/null && PHP_CS_FIXER_IGNORE_ENV=1 vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer --dry-run --using-cache=no --rules=@PSR12 --rules=no_unused_imports --verbose fix tests 2>/dev/null' 'all'
scripts.phpcs:fix:all: bin/header/phpcs 'PHP_CS_FIXER_IGNORE_ENV=1 vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer --using-cache=no --rules=@PSR12 --rules=no_unused_imports --verbose -v fix src 2>/dev/null && PHP_CS_FIXER_IGNORE_ENV=1 vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer --using-cache=no --rules=@PSR12 --rules=no_unused_imports --verbose -v fix tests 2>/dev/null' 'all'

scripts-descriptions.docker-composer:composer-install: Alias for composer install, but within the php docker container.
scripts-descriptions.docker-composer:pimcore-classes-rebuild: Reuilds the Pimcore classes within the php docker container.
scripts-descriptions.docker-composer:presta-sitemaps-dump: Creates the sitemap.xml files within the php docker container. The files will be located at public/*.
scripts-descriptions.maildev:change-permissions: Fix the maildev permissions to be able to receive emails.
scripts-descriptions.cache:clear: Clears the cache via symfony console (soft mode)
scripts-descriptions.cache:delete: Clears the cache via rm command (hard mode)
scripts-descriptions.db:dump:main:sql: Dumps all single tables from the main database to folder (MySQL)
scripts-descriptions.db:restore:main:sql: Restores the main db via sql dumps (MySQL).
scripts-descriptions.phpcs: Runs PHP Coding Standards Fixer (Dry-Run, all folders).
scripts-descriptions.phpcs:check:all: Runs PHP Coding Standards Fixer (Dry-Run, all folders).
scripts-descriptions.phpcs:check:src: Runs PHP Coding Standards Fixer (Dry-Run, src folder).
scripts-descriptions.phpcs:check:tests: Runs PHP Coding Standards Fixer (Dry-Run, tests folder).
scripts-descriptions.phpcs:fix:all: Runs PHP Coding Standards Fixer (Fix, all folders).
scripts-descriptions.phpcs:fix:src: Runs PHP Coding Standards Fixer (Fix, src folder).
scripts-descriptions.phpcs:fix:tests: Runs PHP Coding Standards Fixer (Fix, tests folder).
scripts-descriptions.phpmd: Runs PHP Mess Detector and checks all types (all folders).
scripts-descriptions.phpmd:all: Runs PHP Mess Detector and checks all types (all folders).
scripts-descriptions.phpmd:all-src: Runs PHP Mess Detector and checks all types (src folder).
scripts-descriptions.phpmd:all-tests: Runs PHP Mess Detector and checks all types (tests folder).
scripts-descriptions.phpmd:cleancode: Runs PHP Mess Detector and checks for cleancode (all folders).
scripts-descriptions.phpmd:codesize: Runs PHP Mess Detector and checks for codesize (all folders).
scripts-descriptions.phpmd:controversial: Runs PHP Mess Detector and checks for controversial (all folders).
scripts-descriptions.phpmd:design: Runs PHP Mess Detector and checks for design (all folders).
scripts-descriptions.phpmd:naming: Runs PHP Mess Detector and checks for naming (all folders).
scripts-descriptions.phpmd:unusedcode: Runs PHP Mess Detector and checks for unusedcode (all folders).
scripts-descriptions.phpmd:cleancode-src: Runs PHP Mess Detector and checks for cleancode (src folder).
scripts-descriptions.phpmd:codesize-src: Runs PHP Mess Detector and checks for codesize (src folder).
scripts-descriptions.phpmd:controversial-src: Runs PHP Mess Detector and checks for controversial (src folder).
scripts-descriptions.phpmd:design-src: Runs PHP Mess Detector and checks for design (src folder).
scripts-descriptions.phpmd:naming-src: Runs PHP Mess Detector and checks for naming (src folder).
scripts-descriptions.phpmd:unusedcode-src: Runs PHP Mess Detector and checks for unusedcode (src folder).
scripts-descriptions.phpmd:cleancode-tests: Runs PHP Mess Detector and checks for cleancode (tests folder).
scripts-descriptions.phpmd:codesize-tests: Runs PHP Mess Detector and checks for codesize (tests folder).
scripts-descriptions.phpmd:controversial-tests: Runs PHP Mess Detector and checks for controversial (tests folder).
scripts-descriptions.phpmd:design-tests: Runs PHP Mess Detector and checks for design (tests folder).
scripts-descriptions.phpmd:naming-tests: Runs PHP Mess Detector and checks for naming (tests folder).
scripts-descriptions.phpmd:unusedcode-tests: Runs PHP Mess Detector and checks for unusedcode (tests folder).
scripts-descriptions.phpmnd: Runs PHP Magic Number Detector and detects magic numbers.
scripts-descriptions.phpmnd:all: Runs PHP Magic Number Detector and detects magic numbers (all folders).
scripts-descriptions.phpmnd:src: Runs PHP Magic Number Detector and detects magic numbers (src folder).
scripts-descriptions.phpmnd:tests: Runs PHP Magic Number Detector and detects magic numbers (tests folder).
scripts-descriptions.phpstan:run: Runs PHPStan (PHP Static Analysis Tool, Level max).
scripts-descriptions.phpstan:run:soft: Runs PHPStan (PHP Static Analysis Tool, Level 5).
scripts-descriptions.test: Runs all available tests (phpmnd, codeception, phpstan, phpcs, rector).
scripts-descriptions.test:all: Runs all available tests (phpmnd, codeception, phpstan, phpcs, phpmd).
scripts-descriptions.test:hardcore: Runs the ultimate available tests (phpmnd, codeception, phpstan, phpcs, rector, phpmd).
scripts-descriptions.test:static: Runs only static analysis tests (phpmnd, phpstan, phpcs, phpmd).
scripts-descriptions.test:most: Runs most tests (phpmnd, codeception, phpstan, phpcs).
scripts-descriptions.quick: Does a quick check (PHPStan and PHP Coding Standards Fixer)
